mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PK_ZP(ZP_ID, ZT_ID, EMP_ID, SCHOOL_ID, ZP_TYPE, ZP_TITLE, ZP_PICURL, ZP_VIDEOURL, ZP_ISUSE, DATELINE) VALUES (#{id}, #{ztId}, #{empId}, #{schoolId}, #{type}, #{title}, #{picUrl, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{videoUrl, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isUse}, #{dateline})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM PK_ZP WHERE ZT_ID=#{ztId} AND EMP_ID=#{empId}

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT pz.*, le.emp_name, le.emp_cover,cl.name as school_name, (select count(PK_ZP_ID) from PK_ZAN zan where zan.PK_ZP_ID = pz.ZP_ID) as zan_num, (select count(PK_ZP_ID) from PK_COMMENT pl where pl.PK_ZP_ID = pz.ZP_ID) as pl_num FROM PK_ZP pz LEFT JOIN lx_emp le ON pz.EMP_ID=le.emp_id LEFT JOIN college cl on pz.SCHOOL_ID=cl.coid WHERE pz.ZT_ID=#{themeId} AND pz.ZP_ISUSE='0' AND le.is_use='0' ORDER by zan_num DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM < 2

SELECT pz.*, le.emp_name, le.emp_cover,cl.name as school_name, (select count(PK_ZP_ID) from PK_ZAN zan where zan.PK_ZP_ID = pz.ZP_ID) as zan_num, (select count(PK_ZP_ID) from PK_COMMENT pl where pl.PK_ZP_ID = pz.ZP_ID) as pl_num FROM PK_ZP pz LEFT JOIN lx_emp le ON pz.EMP_ID=le.emp_id LEFT JOIN college cl on pz.SCHOOL_ID=cl.coid WHERE pz.ZP_ID=#{id}

select * from (select t.*, row_number() over(partition by SCHOOL_ID order by ZP_TYPE desc ) rn from (SELECT pz.*, le.emp_name, le.emp_cover,cl.name as school_name, (select count(PK_ZP_ID) from PK_ZAN zan where zan.PK_ZP_ID = pz.ZP_ID) as zan_num, (select count(PK_ZP_ID) from PK_COMMENT pl where pl.PK_ZP_ID = pz.ZP_ID) as pl_num FROM PK_ZP pz LEFT JOIN lx_emp le ON pz.EMP_ID=le.emp_id LEFT JOIN college cl on pz.SCHOOL_ID=cl.coid WHERE pz.ZT_ID=#{themeId} AND pz.ZP_ISUSE='0' AND le.is_use='0') t ) where rn=1
